title: topic /atlas/set_pose takes 2 position arguments, but not three

content.raw:
this works:
rostopic pub /atlas/set_pose --once 'geometry_msgs/Pose' '{position: {y: 6.0, z: 2.0}, orientation: {z: 0, w: 1}}'
but this does not:
rostopic pub /atlas/set_pose --once 'geometry_msgs/Pose' '{position: {x:5, y: 6.0, z: 2.0}, orientation: {z: 0, w: 1}}'
Usage: rostopic pub /topic type [args...]

rostopic: error: Argument error: while scanning a plain scalar
  in "<string>", line 1, column 13:
    {position: {x:5, y: 6.0, z: 2.0}, orientatio ... 
                ^
found unexpected ':'
  in "<string>", line 1, column 14:
    {position: {x:5, y: 6.0, z: 2.0}, orientation ... 
                 ^
Please check http://pyyaml.org/wiki/YAMLColonInFlowContext for details.
content.html:
this works: rostopic pub /atlas/set_pose --once 'geometry_msgs/Pose' '{position: {y: 6.0, z: 2.0}, orientation: {z: 0, w: 1}}' but this does not: rostopic pub /atlas/set_pose --once 'geometry_msgs/Pose' '{position: {x:5, y: 6.0, z: 2.0}, orientation: {z: 0, w: 1}}' Usage: rostopic pub /topic type [args...]

rostopic: error: Argument error: while scanning a plain scalar in "<string>", line 1, column 13: {position: {x:5, y: 6.0, z: 2.0}, orientatio ... ^ found unexpected ':' in "<string>", line 1, column 14: {position: {x:5, y: 6.0, z: 2.0}, orientation ... ^ Please check http://pyyaml.org/wiki/YAMLColonInFlowContext for details.
